title: Amelioration of gold nanoparticles mediated through Ocimum oil extracts induces reactive oxygen species and mitochondrial instability against MCF-7 breast carcinoma
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27816-27830
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04807E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yugal Kishore Mohanta, Kunal Biswas, Awdhesh Kumar Mishra, Biswajit Patra, Bishwambhar Mishra, Jibanjyoti Panda, Satya Kumar Avula, Rajender S. Varma, Bibhu Prasad Panda, Debasis Nayak
The bottom-up synthesis of gold nanoparticles (AuNPs) using Ocimum sanctum essential oil extracts exhibited excellent antimicrobial and therapeutic potential against MCF 7 breast carcinoma through flow cytometry analysis and DNA damage studies.
